|| Name || 名称 || TEXT(100) ||  ||
|| Description || 描述 || TEXT(200) ||  ||
|| RoadID || 道路ID || INTEGER ||  ||
|| ImageFiles || 图像文件 || TEXT(50) || 以"-"隔开 ||
|| AudioFiles || 音频文件 || TEXT(50) || 以"-"隔开 ||
|| Remark || 备注 || TEXT(50) ||  ||
|| Lon || 经度 || REAL(15,8) ||  ||
|| Lat || 纬度 || REAL(15,8) ||  ||
|| X || X坐标 || REAL(15,8) ||  ||
|| Y || Y坐标 || REAL(15,8) ||  ||
